mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.changdi_yuyue_uuid_number as changdiYuyueUuidNumber ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.changdi_id as changdiId ,a.sheshiyuyue_text as sheshiyuyueText ,a.changdi_yuyue_time as changdiYuyueTime ,a.changdi_jieshu_time as changdiJieshuTime ,a.changdi_yuyue_yesno_types as changdiYuyueYesnoTypes ,a.changdi_yuyue_yesno_text as changdiYuyueYesnoText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
